message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price given the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.
